The TzRek-Jad (translated as Baby Fire Elemental) is a pet that can be obtained via defeating TzTok-Jad in the TzHaar Fight Cave. Players are twice as likely at receiving the pet upon defeating TzTok-Jad if they are assigned to defeat it on a slayer task. In addition, players may exchange their fire capes by speaking to TzHaar-Mej-Jal for a 1/200 chance of obtaining TzRek-Jad.

Providing a player defeats TzTok-Jad while on a slayer task for a 1/100 chance of the pet, and hands in their cape, the overall chance of receiving the pet from either the boss or the cape is approximately 1/67.

Players who have completed all six of TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges can right click "Metamorphosis" to change between the TzRek-Jad and JalRek-Jad, which is a smaller version of JalTok-Jad. Attempting to change the pet's appearance before completing the challenges will result in the chatbox stating "You must have completed TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges to do that."

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the chatbox will state You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a cat), it will be placed into their inventory. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack. If a player's inventory is full and they have a follower already, they will not receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 coins to Probita in East Ardougne to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
TzTok-Jad702 11/200

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article has an associated transcript page.
Click here for the transcript.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In dialogue, JalRek-Jad replies with "Kl-Kra!" when asked if it is hungry. "Kl" in the TzHaar language means us or we. While "Kra" is an untranslated word, it is likely that it is saying "We are!" based on context.
  • TzRek-Jad had a festive override wearing a santa hat during the 2020 and 2021 Christmas events.

The '''TzRek-Jad''' (translated as '''Baby Fire Elemental''') is a [[pet]] that can be obtained via defeating [[TzTok-Jad]] in the [[TzHaar Fight Cave]]. Players are twice as likely at receiving the pet upon defeating TzTok-Jad if they are assigned to defeat it on a [[slayer]] task. In addition, players may exchange their [[fire cape]]s by speaking to [[TzHaar-Mej-Jal]] for a 1/200 chance of obtaining TzRek-Jad.

Providing a player defeats TzTok-Jad while on a slayer task for a 1/100 chance of the pet, '''and''' hands in their cape, the overall chance of receiving the pet from either the boss or the cape is approximately 1/67.

Players who have completed all six of [[TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges]] can right click "Metamorphosis" to change between the TzRek-Jad and JalRek-Jad, which is a smaller version of [[JalTok-Jad]]. Attempting to change the pet's appearance before completing the challenges will result in the chatbox stating "''You must have completed TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges to do that.''"

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the [[Chat Interface|chatbox]] will state {{Colour|#ef1020|You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.}}

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a [[cat]]), it will be placed into their [[inventory]]. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state {{Colour|#ef1020|You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack.}} If a player's inventory is full '''and''' they have a follower already, they '''will not''' receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 [[coins]] to [[Probita]] in [[East Ardougne]] to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 [[coins]].

==Trivia==
* In dialogue, JalRek-Jad replies with ''"Kl-Kra!"'' when asked if it is hungry. "Kl" in the [[TzHaar]] language means us or we. While "Kra" is an untranslated word, it is likely that it is saying "We are!" based on context.
*TzRek-Jad had a festive override wearing a [[santa hat]] during the [[2020 Christmas event/Gallery|2020]] and [[2021 Christmas event/Gallery|2021]] Christmas events.
